title: Malebeja's Artworks
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]

+ Welcome to my SCP Art Gallery
 
+ Person of Interest File #████/18 - "Malebeja"
 
**Reason of interest:** The subject, colloquially known as Malebeja, is described according to the Foundation's database, as a subject of interest, due to the possession of valuable information on different anomalies, as well as encrypted and vital information on the events that occurred in ██/██/████.
      
> "In my several years of observation, analysis and research on the activities, documents and experiments carried out by the Foundation, they allowed me to collect and acquire detailed information about it and its anomalies, as well as my own data on the reality that makes up this.
> I have become a "subject of interest" for them, so I introduce myself: I am "Malebeja", and I hope we get along well, dear Foundation ".
  
[[size large]] [[collapsible show="Would you like to see more of my Artworks?" hide="Some Familiar Places"]] [[/size]]

+++ [*https://www.deviantart.com/malebeja DeviantArt]
+++ [*https://twitter.com/Malebeja1 Twitter]
+++ [*https://malebeja1.tumblr.com/ Tumblr]
 
 [[/collapsible]]

------

+ Featured Artwork

+ Viatorem Caeruleus: The Eldritch Artist from the Stars

Thank you very much for the Artist Showcase of this month, I really appreciate it.

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfow1ik-d2d044a7-ff86-49a7-8345-12646dc524fb.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..eFeIjDvHROfZCB8tRSkAGtPSttmf8LHEsAlarqLe6SQ]]

> "In the ways of existence the artist traces his BLUE line, sky, earth, sea, infinite emptiness and everything, ink from the brush, crucible of existence, SKY under which our geniuses are born, we are art, art is the universe, our dreams, our mind, and our spirit, that the CANVAS be our way, that the blue line of the master guides us, Nior'h Cavanka'ab Stratteva!"

@@ @@

------

+ New Artworks

[[tabview]]
[[tab New Artworks]]

+++ Paint
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df8642m-15249f94-b2bd-46f1-8e04-d74def4aa71a.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..L7PktikCTvUKQhs-G-AWt5JpoeQyNbT4rd_Y9RnaO4Y]]

------

+ The SCP Foundation Universe
 
[[tabview]]
[[tab SCP]]
+ Illustrations of SCP Gods and Anomalous Group Beings

> +++ Beings beyond the comprehension and understanding of humanity, sometimes even the Foundation itself. Carriers from a supernatural power to one of an incalculable level that could put the universe and beyond at risk.
 

+ Old Gods

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="The Scarlet King" hide="Crimson King"]]

**"Beautiful sphere of cosmic matter, you will have the honor of being my personal kingdom"**

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df6i4co-d12eb4ed-461d-4174-ac87-34a440911c7e.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1451,strp/scarlet_king_s_realm_by_malebeja_df6i4co-fullview.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..OMpF9AKI9wTG9Hy5EXJmHqNVobjpbW6uOwmMLOJJY1g]]

[[/collapsible]]

+ Illustrations of SCP Objects

> +++ The day to day of the Foundation and its anomalies, of all the varieties that the human mind could concede and beyond its own imagination.

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="SCP-001: Awaiting De-classification [Blocked] " hide="The Unknown SCP"]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="SCP-706: Perfect Porcelain Doll" hide="The Tragic Doll"]]

**A being as beautiful as tragic at the same time.**

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df9e96t-9544f3b1-36de-42b0-831c-96866a6a4a8e.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..yhUwfHea_shlmYWyIO3KlQqLVuxz4y5O_F7ZcVGarj0]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="SCP-999: The Tickle Monster " hide="A Very Nice Friend"]]

**Cute Slime**

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df6r7f1-c936f27e-4381-4443-ba63-a811cdadc4d6.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1273,strp/cute_slime_by_malebeja_df6r7f1-fullview.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..C8w2GhriOtayVLGbf6sgzIfJNgE125ApdrMGHxcb1vw]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="SCP 2317: Devourer of Worlds " hide="Demon Sultan of Chaos"]]

+ SCP 001: When Day Breaks Monsters Concepts

> [[size large]] Bio-Horror Concept Designs [[/size]]

+++ Random Creature Biological Corruption
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfi88vu-b2bcb60e-ac16-476f-a211-bff2be9b033d.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..WTczxDt0WFHE2OuFRJ31KWRdVwSeTX8OMkmNgakEb_4]]

+++ Concept of Possible Biological Corruption of the SCP-166
**Note: The hair was dissolved within its own biological matter, becoming extensions of flesh like tentacles, leaving strands of hair as the last thing of what was once her hair, being the only physical evidence of being her.**

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfef97k-1409bd89-4c3a-4eba-b41a-f94b9e554675.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..mNOEtnf77DH45UjLA2VZeWDZQTCVZV5Y7DEhBHG3isg]]

[[/collapsible]]

+ Some random arts of various SCP

> +++ A look at the more casual and daily life of the entities of the SCP universe.

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="The Scarlet King" hide="The Crimson King"]]

+++ Scarlet King
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df5p5x2-55bf494d-fe29-4e13-a8b8-3b292463789d.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1710,q_80,strp/scarlet_king_by_malebeja_df5p5x2-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..7JhwwEM9k2WbaKMNXN2oupKOc0NRQGX04yqhBWhRqoM]]

[[collapsible show="The Plague Doctor" hide="A casual day in the life of a Mad Doctor"]]

+++ 049
**A little experiment trying to make the mask with a style like a skull**

------

+ The SCP: Outbreak Universe

> +++ A headcanon project made in conjunction with [[*user DR3ADM4N]]
 
[[tabview]]
[[tab  Viatorem Caeruleus]]

+ Viatorem Caeruleus: The Eldritch Artist from the Stars
 
> "The great canvas of Existence, the Universe itself, has given us its incomparable artistic beauty, its magnificent strokes, its intimidating presence, a constantly expanding canvas where Existence performs its matchless works, appreciate the beauty of the cosmos, and its great aura of respect and terror that hides its deepest entrails."

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Viatorem Caeruleus" hide="The Voyager"]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfii44o-aae5561f-e207-4de8-9380-c2655df6a3fa.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Ghh0zMjpG5vBhJPt4zL05EqvkKpXgsRVDh_Xnnj7kr4]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfow1ik-d2d044a7-ff86-49a7-8345-12646dc524fb.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..eFeIjDvHROfZCB8tRSkAGtPSttmf8LHEsAlarqLe6SQ]]

[[footnote]] Image Font: https://www.dafont.com/techno-hideo.font  [[/footnote]]

[[/collapsible]]

> +++ Ancient scrolls recovered by civilizations lost in time, from vast dimensions barely understandable by the human mind, narrate the existence of an entity associated with the eternal change of matter and transformation, a conceptual being, which under our poor human reason, we conceive as a God, Divinity and Art in its purest state

[[/tab]]
[[tab Foundation Reseachers]]

+ Dr. Fabienne Landman

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Dr Fabienne Landman" hide="Dr. Landman"]]

> "The more you cooperate with assigned orders and tasks, along with fewer detours and tantrums, the better we'll all get along, okay?"

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4b449a52-1c9a-49d2-b786-32f2d063e625/dfialyn-a6b29485-1254-4eeb-a4c6-f3d8a5c77400.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..IbZYPbK_Mc52GKpQ5mQHLfAYUkfxOf9ESzPzv31UHSQ]]
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfbuv3f-d18f818e-4870-4ae6-ba90-3cc1d70e0656.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..2uboBuvMGLOGo_EkLja2FSBKL6BVapiSb6cguee_Q7k]]

> +++ Sometimes the most sinister enigmas do not come out of hell, but usually fall from heaven

  The Foundation's Lunar Area-32 Chief Investigator, Dr. Fabienne Landman, is currently working at Site-19, following a catastrophic event on the Lunar surface that forced the station's crew to evacuate the Moon's surface and return. to Earth, forever losing the SCP specimens located at Lunar Site-32

  However, Fabienne returned as someone different, she may never have returned from the Moon.
[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab The Gods of Death]]

+ The Grim Reapers: The personifications of Destiny

+ Small Death

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Small Death" hide="Small Grim Reaper"]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfd1bhy-cf0f29a8-3ff9-4685-a926-53f069567284.png/v1/fill/w_954,h_838,q_70,strp/small_death_by_malebeja_dfd1bhy-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..1TsZtxgQjFSQu5WhaAW0W7o1Q6pmXqCqQLnypTHVpTE]]

[[/collapsible]]

+ Great Death

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Great Death" hide="Great Grim Reaper"]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfd0oyq-d0da9826-6a9c-4d6d-9b8c-11e2320a21b5.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1125,q_80,strp/great_death_by_malebeja_dfd0oyq-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..BAOIHFz4OwfYWTwqcgoKDp3pv-L08ohTNjpi9MuSyBs]]

[[/collapsible]]

+ All Death

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="All Death" hide="The Greatest Grim Reaper"]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfcywkv-7b5e30ec-6c13-47e2-9b20-08f8470ff5bd.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1088,q_80,strp/all_death_by_malebeja_dfcywkv-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..LiRFfG-0phC5cJwZJ39lgDzG8h6JvnqlReRdsL1CwVc]]

[[/collapsible]]

> +++ Known as the 3 Deaths, primordial entities of the natural cycle of life and death, creation and destruction, black and white, are considered as something beyond gods.

Since ancient times, reference has been made to this dark trinity, it is even theorized that it is not about 3 beings, but about 2, including that they are all the same being.

Either way, they are feared and portrayed as hideous avatars of cosmic horror by the races who know of their obscene existence, and all that dies, withers, rots, ceases to function, or cycles to an end, is under the sinister gaze of the 3 deaths."

[[/tab]]
[[tab The Scarlet King]]

+ The Scarlet King: The Eldritch Crimson Monarch

> "The immensity of the universe is as interesting as it is unique, it is difficult to decide which one to start exploring and much more to choose which one to stay with, I would not settle for one, I would love many, hundreds, even thousands of universes."

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="The Scarlet King" hide="The Supreme Emperor of Darkness"]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df7oey3-6937edb9-b0f9-43ec-bec4-2622f8d759b4.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..pGCBlRdQcSwOwlZMMDf_LmMr73oahMaO9GnGnJWtXd0]]

[[/collapsible]]

> +++ A being beyond the comprehension and mind of even other dimensional beings, an entity that in the view of said anomalous and unique beings, can be classified as a deity.

The Scarlet King, known as Khahrahk, or simply as Harak, belongs to the group of the most powerful beings, not only in the universe, but in the multiverse itself, very few have the courage and little judgment to face him.

A King feared, respected, hated and even loved by various beings throughout the cosmos. There is no black or white in the perception of the beings that see it and interact with it, each one will have a different vision of it.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Sarkicism: The Worships of the Flesh and Disease]]

+ Grand Karcist Ion

> "Grand Karcist of Adytum, master of genetic manipulation, founding father of Sarkicism" 
 
[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="Grand Karcist Ion" hide="Grand Karcist of Adytum"]]
  
[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfbzfgf-22dd08c8-0266-4435-98f1-2c5e4ba7569f.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..xUMD2mAi_T7dLg3eCpodo0-iQyo-pBrB1mNqrD5Wrzw]]

[[/collapsible]]

> +++ Flesh is the blood and the cradle, of flesh we are all made, sacrilegious will be the man who adopts the machine and despises the flesh, return to the flesh of creation, my children, and with it, the brilliant crimson dawn that breaks the night

Coming from a distant land lost in time, Ion is a preacher of the Sarkic Church, which, more than a simple religion, is an existentialist thought for all his followers.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Alagadda: The Mysterious Realm]]

+ The Hanged King: The King of Alagadda

> "Welcome to my kingdom... Alagadda, foreign entity, be courteous and introduce yourself, the cordialities before the King will always be a reason for gratitude."

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="The Hanged King" hide="The King of Alagadda"]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df6sw1a-f636d729-74de-4589-a85b-f1219e2ab980.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Y3JSaVrdTte4nrP37kbn8NVkiG-f4AnfkeHRiqFR5is]]

[[/collapsible]]

> +++ "A King of incomprehensible nature beyond human understanding, and an even more unknown mind, even before other entities of divine nature."

Monarch and main figure of authority of Alagadda, the one who governs each hectare, inhabitant, species and being that lives in his kingdom with an iron fist and watches from his throne the passing of time of everything that makes up that mysterious place.

+ Hanged King's Servants
 
[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="The Ambassador of Alagadda" hide="Mysterious entity and personal right hand of the hanged king in all his orders and wishes"]]

+ The Ambassador of Alagadda

> "Your wishes are my wishes. Your orders are my orders. I am the one who will send your message, your word, your law, not only in Alagadda, I will also do it throughout the universe and beyond."

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df7fvvz-6727df60-d693-4edd-a9e8-925b7f55fe58.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..zACVFxdT-IjRhf8EVZlR8njfUSJAeVEQ4frBII039rc]]

> +++ There are worse destinations than death, and the Ambassador is capable of doing it.

   Entity of unknown nature beyond human understanding, second in command to Alagadda and personal emissary of the Hanged King in all that he commands.
   Executioner of those who have the courage (and stupidity) to face their King, and especially the Ambassador himself. Death would be a merciful punishment compared to the horror it would be capable of inflicting, an indescribable horror to the human mind.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="The Four Lords of Alagadda" hide="Mysterious entities that serve the Hanged King in whatever he wishes"]]

+ The White Lord, Wearer of the Diligent Mask [[footnote]] Lumen Sage (Bayonetta Game) inspired design for his clothing [[/footnote]]

> "My mind, my serenity, my actions, my very being, loyalty always to my King, the King of Alagadda"

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df8ge29-685a891f-4865-4e87-a30b-3d3e6817f753.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._wNIpl9sjwoGvuGfQ8TQKqGYl0kTdFPl8BhW59FE0R8]]

> +++ A being that is capable of destroying you without any remorse, even without malice? That's the "Diamond Angel"[[footnote]] Inspired by the meanings of the word Diamond in ancient Greek ("own", "unchangeable", "unbreakable", "indomitable", "I rule, I dominate") And Angel, from Latin and in turn derived from Greek ("Messenger) [[/footnote]]

Inexpressive, indifferent, without malice or mercy, the White Lord. or the "Diamond Angel", in the most fearsome and deadly environment possible, will impose his presence on those who stand against him, and will conquer all adversity in the name of his King.

Bearer of an intellect without equal, impeccable skill, superior combat knowledge, and in the company of his weapon, he will give his body and soul before all adversity that may stand in the way of the well-being of his King.
   
+ The Yellow Lord, Wearer of the Odious Mask

> "My scores, my musical instruments, my music, my very being, my loyalty will always belong to my King, to the King of Alagadda."

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfid0mo-1375133b-ae49-4bb7-8d04-ac73b29da682.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YOebtd__LW-RENVMnsXsP6aQAh7SVGEfyX333IAIvIo]]

> +++ Enchanting melodies for those who are worthy of their presence, screams and wailing from hell for those who are not worthy of their presence.
 
Musical compositions of enchanting melody and incomparable harmony, the personal musical composer of the King of Alagadda, the Yellow Lord, who will always dedicate his best musical scores to him for the delight of his majesty, day and night, when he wishes and commands. without hesitating for a moment.

+ The Red Lord, Wearer of the Mirthful Mask

> "My wines, my toasts, my celebrations, my very being, my loyalty is to my King, the King of Alagadda."

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/df8mgzh-7c6856c9-eed5-40b0-855b-1858602dbce8.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..rqVPdRcCCu2LJAWETiUAcWFNjKD_Mk3NpRnUxHocvK4]]

> +++ Someone interesting with whom you would like to have a good drink of wine on an anomalous starry night in Alagadda, without fear of the adverse effects of what you are drinking, right?

Not all forms of hypnosis are achieved through sight, the palate is also a weak point for lovers of the most exotic drink. The Red Lord, master of the composition of drinks, and even medicines, is key and an important pillar for the crown of Alagadda, after all, even the King does not resist to drink something, right?
 
+ The Black Lord, Wearer of the Anguished Mask
> "My knowledge, my investigations, my works, my very being, my loyalty belong to my King, the King of Alagadda"

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/00184a5a-adaa-46e5-bab0-c5ee46ca5c62/dfict13-bb5a0a4c-6566-4058-b255-0971da74923b.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..MXLR_WLwn8Re6SO9RiuPe-jXPdpP7pDytoT5KZ6wIQA]]

> +++ If I had to describe this entity, it would be with 2 words: charming and manipulative.

The most mysterious lord of Alagadda, the Black Lord, little or nothing is known of him. In charge of complex and precise functions that require a specialist in the mind and vast knowledge, his intelligence and charming way of expressing himself have given him a fearsome aura among the inhabitants of Alagadda.

+++ Wings
